Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Cliotide T7 (CT7; Cter R; natural AMPs; cyclotides; XXC; 3S=S, UCBB1ab; Fabaceae, plants)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against Human non-small lung cancer cells A549, bacteria E. coli (MIC 40 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 0.625 uM), S.aureus (MIC>160 uM), and C.albicans (>160 uM). Can induce chemokines such as TNF-alpha (likely Pro-inflammatory), thus playing a role in immune modulation.  upDATED 4/2016; 8/2019; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Nguyen GK, Zhang S, Nguyen NT, Nguyen PQ, Chiu MS, Hardjojo A, Tam JP.2011
Literature Information.Title: Discovery and characterization of novel cyclotides originated from chimeric precursors consisting of albumin-1 chain a and cyclotide domains in the fabaceae family
